text: Nanuza is a plant genus in the family Velloziaceae, described as a genus in 1976.Smith, Lyman Bradford & Ayensu, Edward Solomon. 1976. Smithsonian Contributions to Botany 30: 38Tropicos, Nanuza L.B. Sm. & Ayensu The entire genus is endemic to Brazil.Alves, José Luiz de Hamburgo. 2002. Two new species of Nanuza (Velloziaceae) from Brazil.
